body_html:
Hi drpngx,

Tried your proposal getting the same errors.

I did the following:

In CROSSTOOL_nvcc.tpl I replaced the line:
cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/"
with this line:
cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include"

Any additional proposal?

Thanks,
Ron

body:
Hi drpngx,

Tried your proposal getting the same errors. 

I did the following:

In CROSSTOOL_nvcc.tpl I replaced the line:
`cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/"`
with this line:
`cxx_builtin_include_directory: "/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/4.8.5/include"`

Any additional proposal?

Thanks,
Ron
